comment: Love Spotify and subscribe to the premium plan. But the new updates removing the like button and replacing with a plus sign are so annoying I actually consider finding an alternative. It became hard to remove songs from the liked (and other playlists). The idea is nice, you can track a song in different playlists. But the execution isn't as nice.
key sentence: The key words from the comment are: "like button", "plus sign", "remove songs", "liked playlists", "other playlists".
the function of activity: The activity involves searching, library function, playing/pausing items, viewing downloaded songs/podcasts, downloading songs or podcasts, adding to playlists, shuffling a playlist, connecting to devices, previewing episodes, type replies to episodes and accessing history page, setting page
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Add to other playlist', 'description': 'Add the current music to another playlist'}, {'name': 'Remove from this playlist', 'description': 'Remove the current music from the current playlist'}, {'name': 'Add to queue', 'description': 'Add the current music to the playback queue'}, {'name': 'View album', 'description': 'View details of the album containing the current music'}, {'name': 'View artist', 'description': 'View details of the artist of the current music'}]
